## Client.find() method

find queries the store for entities matching the given query parameters.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
find<T = any>(threadID: ThreadID, collectionName: string, query: QueryJSON): Promise<InstanceList<T>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  threadID | ThreadID | the ID of the database |
|  collectionName | string | The human-readable name of the model to use. |
|  query | QueryJSON | The object that describes the query. User Query class or primitive QueryJSON type. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;InstanceList&lt;T&gt;&gt;
